refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the number of rows that were changed by the most recent SQL statement

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the numbers of rows that were changed by the most recent SQL statement executed against the dbhandle database handle.

example.title: sqlite_changes example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$dbhandle = sqlite_open('mysqlitedb');
$query = sqlite_query($dbhandle, "UPDATE users SET email='jDoe@example.com' WHERE username='jDoe'");
if (!$query) {
    exit('Error in query.');
} else {
    echo 'Number of rows modified: ', sqlite_changes($dbhandle);
}

/* OO Example */
$dbhandle = new SQLiteDatabase('mysqlitedb');
$query = $dbhandle->query("UPDATE users SET email='jDoe@example.com' WHERE username='jDoe'");
if (!$query) {
    exit('Error in query.');
} else {
    echo 'Number of rows modified: ', $dbhandle->changes();
}

?>
